title: Calendar: Could not find definition for AUS Eastern Standard Time
content:
Hi team,

I am battling problems snoozing & dismissing notifications for my Calendars in Thunderbird.

In the console I am seeing lots of: `Calendar: Could not find definition for AUS Eastern Standard Time`

How does Thunderbird define timezones, and where can I correct this?

I am running 128.5.1esr and my calendar is Radicale 3.0.6.

Thanks!
creator: electricdesert

title: Message mini previews AKA message snippets under subject?
content: In Outlook, both the classic and new versions, there's a feature beneath the subject line and date that provides a one-line preview of messages. This feature is incredibly useful for identifying spam and getting an overview of the content before clicking into messages. I noticed that Thunderbird doesn't offer this type of functionality. After some research, I found two outdated plugins that previously offered this capability in column view, but they no longer work. Is there a way to implement this feature in Thunderbird, or are there any plans to reintroduce it? It's a significant feature that is currently the only thing preventing me from fully switching to Thunderbird.
creator: andrew284

title: When I delete from inbox the contents don't go to trash
content: When I delete from inbox the contents don't go to trash
creator: ozarkdave

title: Pop-up that is interfering with my Thunderbird app.
content:
A Pop-up entitled "Enter credentials for <my email> on imap.gmail.com" has appeared recently. This "page" headed "Google", says "Mozilla Thunderbird Email wants to access your google account. This will allow ...Thunderbird ... to Read, Compose, Send, and permanently delete all your email from Gmail". If I click the "Deny" button the same thing pops up and I cannot get to, not download any of my new emails.

It seems to me that if I "allow" this, it goes against all the privacy in Thunderbird settings and gives permission to take control of my account.

How do I get rid of this and get "back to normal" (this has only started in the las couple of weeks)?

I'm about ready to delete Thunderbird and try something else - this after 20-odd years of using Thunderbird with little or no problems.
creator: brashnz

title: e-mail
content:
Hello,

I cannot receive or send emails with thunderbird.
creator: pveldhuizen

title: Hotkey to open Thunderbird no longer working
content:
I have been using a Dell keyboard for many years, ````````````````````````````````````````````````````









I have a Dell keyboard mdl SK-8135 that I have been using for many years. The one feature I liked was the fact that it had an email hot key along the top of the keyboard that would open my Thunderbird email. Recently however that button when depressed opens my browser and not Thunderbird.

I'm not sure why this is happening but I would appreciate any help or suggestions as to what I can do to get this dedicated key to once again open Thunderbird. I guess it would help if I mentioned that I am currently using Windows10.

Thank you all.
creator: wml52

title: "Find Events Pane": serach by category possible?
content:
Hi all

hope that's the correct place to ask a TB calendar (formerly: Lightning) question?

I am using categories for different types of calendar entries and wonder whether there is a way to search/select only entries with a specific category (i.e. Anniversary) in the "Find Events" pane?

The category seems not to be a search item i.e. for "All Events" contain ....

Thanks, Michael
creator: michael528

title: Installing email addresses on Thunderbird
content: I have about six emails and would like to find them all on Thunderbird. These include iCloud, gmail, design.net.au, and outlook. I find managing the installation difficult. Any ideas to simplify this process?
creator: lizann249

title: Thunderbird vs. outlook.com - messages not coming through
content:
Lately I've noticed that e-mails aren't always coming through in Thunderbird.

They aren't in the junk folder either; but when I log in to outlook webmail - I have an outlook.com address - I find that some (but not all) of the messages have come through, either into the inbox or junk folders.

Any suggestions?
creator: bd_11111

title: thunderbird pop3 to outlook
content: I have a situation where i have Computer A, running win 7 pro, having thunderbird using pop3. On there I can see all my old emails going back to 2007. I now have Computer B, Win11 pro, running Zimbra with imap. I also have outlook. I am still using the same email address Is there a way I can copy my old emails from Computer A to Computer B? I have the whole pop3 thunderbird folder on a usb drive.
creator: jrshah169

title: Thunderbird and iPrimus
content: My mother has an iPrimus email address which she accesses through Thunderbird. Today, she noticed a large chunk of her emails had disappeared out of the blue. IPrimus couldn't find the issue or locate the missing emails and were under the impression it was a Thunderbird - third-party- issue. Can anyone please step me through how to retrieve emails or reset activity? Is there also a direct line with Thunderbird to speak with?
creator: jjclarke

title: Gmail - deleted auto save drafts are shown in app, how to safely delete in TB?
content:
Hello, The description of the old add-on, which is unfortunately no longer compatible, says it all: https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/auto-save-drafts-folders/

Case 2: You are using Gmail IMAP. Gmail automatically copies deleted emails to the trash folder. This means that if you took your time writing an email, there would be multiple copies of the draft in your Trash folder when you got done. One for each time auto save ran.

> df

Does anyone have an idea how to solve this in TB >128?

Thank you

Stefan
creator: muellerstefan

title: Scomparsa Cartella di Posta Inviata per probabile Overflow
content: Mi è Scomparsa la Cartella Posta Out dal Browser di posta e nel profilo non trovo la cartella Sent se non quella rigeneratosi pur settando visualizza file nascosti. Deduco che il File raggiungendo l'overflow sia stato spostato o rinominato ma non so come trovarlo ricordo che era piuttosto grande forse anche oltre 4G (potrebbero essere 6G), ho cercato tutti i file in tutti i percori dei vari accont e ho utlizzato RECUVER ma senza esito Dovrei recuperare questo File magari poi editandolo come testo e dividendolo e ricompattandolo... ma non riesco a trovarlo Grazie

title: Thunderbird doesn't remember passwords
content:
Good Day

First ... -> Wayne Mery don't delete this post. This is not duplicate. If You want delete ... delete solved post. Thanks for making me type everything out again Wayne - you've been very helpful.

Back to the topic.

MT new installation - does not remember passwords despite checking the "checkbox" in the IMAP account. This also applies to Google accounts for calendar (non-IMAP account). The password manager is empty. After restarting MT, the same.
creator: rsiuta

title: Cartella profilo non mostra messaggi
content: Ciao, uso thunderbird su windows10 e ora anche su Ubuntu. Gestisco con thunderbird molti indirizzi email e ho tutto suddiviso in cartelle. Si vede tutto bene tranne (!!!) la casella principale "posta in arrivo" in cui arrivano diversi indirizzi email e che nel tempo è diventato un file di grandi dimensioni. Nella casella si vedono i titoli delle mail, ma non il contenuto neanche aprendo un messaggio in una nuova finestra. Il problema è identico sia in Windows che in Ubuntu. Se avete idee su come risolvere siete i benvenuti. Grazie, Barbara
creator: barbaraF

title: no connexion
content: No connexion... receive and send don't work
creator: berlib

title: Mozilla Thunderbird malfunctions
content:
Hello, I upgraded to your 'unstable' version of Mozilla Thunderbird for email last year. The past few months it has been taking as much as 5 minutes before it opens up to the home page (in box). And in the past few weeks, the New Message icon top left of home screen has disappeared. So, I can only send emails to people who are already in my inbox, and trash box, by clicking on reply. I can't send an email to a new person that I want to email for the first time ever.

Is it possible to go back to the old version of Thunderbird? How would I do that, and would I lose all the emails currently in my inbox, and in my Files?

Gwen J. Barry Lwr Sackville, N.S.
creator: gwenb

creator: grantsurtees

title: Follow-up mailings to specific recipients
content: I use the Thunderbird add ons "mail merge" and "send later" to create mass mailings with individual salutations etc. Now I also want to send an automatic follow-up to these mailings. However, only to the people who didn't answer to the first mailing should receive a follow-up. Is it possible to automatize this process with Thunderbird? Or is there maybe an add on I can use for that? Right now I have to check every mail individually for replies and answer one after another by hand. That takes a lot of time and there has to be a solution for that. Can you guys help me with that? Thank you so much in advance!
creator: nj2

title: Versione Thunderbird per tablet
content: Buongiorno, ho problemi sulla versione di Thunderbird scaricata nel mio tablet. Ovvero ,una volta scaricato sul tablet l applicazione,mi sono reso conto che non sono inseriti il calendario e le altre funzione come nel computer di casa. Come si risolve il problema?
creator: digitalinknet

title: Settings for talktalk email have changed
content: I have used my Talktalk email through Thunderbird for several years, but last week it stopped working. It says "Please change the Authentication method on the server settings" but doesn't tell me what to change them too. I've tried all of the suggested alternatives but nothing is working. OAth is not one of the available settings and that works with my Microsoft account.. See screenshot below Please can you help? I really like Thunderbird and have been using it for many years. In hope! - thank you, Christina
creator: chrismburrows

title: thunderbird freeses during importation from outlook
content: thunderbird freeses during importation from outlook
creator: adel.habak

title: "Not responding" when emails loading, opening attachments. System is too slow
content: I keep getting a message "Not responding" for a few seconds, I can't move from one email to the next before I get an error. It loads eventually but it's taking forever to review my emails.
creator: alma.negrete

title: Missing Messages between two dates
content:
Hello,

my old laptop SSD crashed and I had to re-install Thunderbird. It took a few days to do so, in this time I switched from Windows 10 to Linux Mint.

After an import of a (luckily fresh) backup into the new Thunderbird installation, it don't receive messages between 02. December 2024 and 10. December 2024. I can find them via Webmailer (strato.de), but if I click on "Receive new mails" in Thunderbird, there are "no new messages" in its oppinion.

But it is possible to send me a new Mail to the given address, that will be received immediatly.

What can I do to get these E-Mails of the given date range?

Regards Tim
creator: tim306

title: Lost My Old Emails when Switching Computers
content:
I started using Netscape Email in 1996. Moved to Tbird. I have archived emails by year going back to 1996 on my old desktop PC (Win 10). I bought a new PC (Win 11) and installed Tbird. I entered my email account info into Tbird and started receiving emails. I then followed the instructions for moving the Tbird emails from the old computer to the new. (I went to Troubleshooting Info on the old computer, opened the Profile Folder, went up to the Thunderbird folder, copied it to an external hard drive, and pasted it in the same place on the new computer.)

I opened Tbird, the archives folders do not show up. I looked in the Profile Folder, and I have three profiles. (I tried pasting twice.) A picture is attached. The old computer only shows the top one (59t8...).

How do I get my archived folders back, or how do I have Tbird on the new computer use the profile on the old one?

Thanks, - Andy
creator: solberg221

title: Saving Inbox folders remotely
content: HI I have many folders in my inbox on TB and some I don't want loaded each time I open TB (they are old files that I don't need day to day but may need sometime) What is the best way to take these off TB whilst being able to import them to TB if I need them later. Thanks. Mark
creator: MarkKennett

title: "Unable to login at server. Probably wrong configuration, username, or password"
content: I can't add a gmail account without getting th above message
creator: glen.cleary004

title: Installing Thunderbird on a Windows 11 PC problem.
content: I have tried to install Thunderbird multiple times on my Windows 11 PC. Everytime I try to import my Outlook files it locks up at 33%. How can i resolve this issue? Thank you.
creator: timglass7

title: search button
content:
Hi iam using thunderbird for sooooo many years maybe 15 i dont remember. BUT lately it makes me crazy. If i am trying to fing some email i am using search area in the top of the app. And it will find nothing. Even if i know there is email from person who i am searching for. I will type just few letters or half od the email name and it will find nothning. To be able to find email i have to go online google mail web and search over there.

Why is it like this?
creator: paja.stanul

title: Many changes to Thunderbird in most recent version
content: Version 128.5.1esr seems to have eliminated many shortcuts. For instance, there is no right click option to delete one or multiple messages any more, and there are no shortcut buttons (such as "Unread") at the top of the message screen. Is there any way to get these back?
creator: gordon.graham

title: Can´t export my address book to CSV file
content:
Can´t export my address book to CSV file. Done everything I found in HELP. Can only export a to ZIP. In the ZIP-Folder is no CSV - only the whole profile.

How can I do this.? Thanks and God bless Kim (72y / male)
creator: lionmessage52

title: Problemas con Hotmail....me tiene harto...
content: Hola, veo que todos preguntan y tienen el mismo problema. Tengo Thunderbird 115.16.3 (64-bit) para Mac. Dispongo de Mac Os High Sierra, y no voy a actualizar, porque los nuevos Os de Mac, son lentos y pesados. El caso es que, solo Hotmail, me está dando problemas. Dice que la contraseña no es la correcta, cuando eso no es cierto. Me sucede en dos equipos distintos, con el mismo Os. Hoy, incluso, vino un cliente, que le está sucediendo en el iPhone. Me suena a algo de Microsoft, para molestar a los usuarios de Mac, pero no sabría deciros el motivo. Instalé Thunderbird, porque Mac Mail, (Que no me gusta un pelo), dejó de funcionar hace ya mucho, y por eso, os he elegido. Llevo ya un par de años, muy contento, pero ya hace unos meses, que está pasando esto. He probado las configuraciones de la info de vuestra web de ayuda, pero nada funciona. Evidentemente, algo está mal. Si nos podéis ayudar a mí, y al resto que están preguntando, pues agradecidos. Y si es culpa de Microsoft, como me imagino, comentarlo, así ya directamente borro las cuentas basura de hotmail que tengo para nada, y ya me olvido para siempre de Microsoft. Gracias!.
creator: joaquinmjuan

title: Retriving deleted emails.
content: I accidently deleted all my Gmail Starred emails from the gold colored “Starred” folder which is located below the Inbox/Drafts/Sent Mail/All Mail/Spam/Trash/Important folders. I didn’t know that when you delete email from “Starred” folder it also deletes email from your Inbox folder. Can I get these emails back?
creator: krasnowb39

title: Mail incorrectly marked as Junk
content:
Hi,

I get messages from Gumtree which often get marked as Junk.

Is it possible to add a specific Domain to the Thunderbird White List ie @chat.gumtree.com

I have searched for this issue, but all the posts and replies I've found are very old and not very helpful.

Regards, Paul
creator: pebbleridge13

title: display name on e-mails
content: How can I get the name of the person and their e-mail address to show up when sending an e-mail. Some of my contacts the info does show up for and others it does not.
creator: wnachenb

title: exporting between dates
content: Is it possible to use Thunderbird's export function to export emails sent/received between two dates on my desktop and then import that onto the work laptop? I need to update work's new laptop and only need to do it between two dates.

title: Comptes bloqués

title: NÃO CONSIGO ENVIAR E RECEBER MENSAGENS
content:
Olá, boa tarde!

Gostaria de ajuda para solucionar um problema no meu e-mail thunderbird. Ja tem quase quinze dias que não consigo receber e enviar e-mails. Já tentei fazer tudo que foi de meu alcance. Gostaria de auxilio.

Grata. Aguardo retorno.
creator: debysaudeleblon

title: Unable to add a Gmail account - Unable to login at server. Probably wrong configuration, username, or password
content:
When I attempt to add a Gmail account, I get this error - "Unable to login at server. Probably wrong configuration, username, or password"

Below are the steps with screenshots: - checked for no cookies to prevent Google from asking for an actual login - no stored google passwords - didn't put in my password on setup - TB finds the available configuration - prompted to login at google - add google password - allow access - error message

I have restarted Thunderbird. I have checked for updates (even though I have it on auto-update).

Are there settings on my Google or Gmail account that could prevent this from working?
creator: trentwhip-fox

title: Calendar set-up
content: I am trying to set up a shared calendar that all the employees in my office can access and add to on their own computers, but I am having trouble doing so. Ideally, I would like this on our network to be easily used. At some point, we will also need to be able to access it on our cell phones. How do we do this?
creator: kaila1

title: contacts no longer shows chen trying to send.  Also  "Sent no lonmger appearss?
content: I some how deleted my contacts in side bar when trying to send. Also my "Send" doesen't show either. I have tried everthing to fix, but nothing works? Thank You!

content:

Also, is there a setting to be able to click on these "threaded" snippets to expand them to the whole message? Thanks!

title: bcc group emails being returned?
content:
Hello, When using my Thunderbird email, I email myself the original and then I send mass emails to people using the bcc feature so everyone doesn't receive everyone's email addresses.

I've done it several times recently without issue. Yesterday, when I tried to send something out to the group, I immediately was notified that almost everyone on the list rejected the email and it was returned as undeliverable. I did not change any settings and I did not change the email list. So why am I getting this error message: This message was created automatically by mail delivery software.

A message that you sent could not be delivered to one or more of its recipients. This is a permanent error. The following address(es) failed:

...and then it goes on to list nearly everyone it was sent to, but it looks some maybe go through. I am baffled by this. I tried to resend the mass email again today and it did the same thing,

Please help. Thank you, Bill C.
creator: Condomgr

title: Moving Thunderbird from Macbook to Windows 11
content:
Hello

I have the Thunderbird folder from the Macbook which contains install and profiles ini files and Crash Reports, Profiles and Pending Pings.

I have made several attempts to move all the files and folders over but it doesn't matter whether I move them before I install Thunderbird or after I've installed Thunderbird and before I launch the program but every time I get invited to open a new account; I've even tried opening a new account and then moving the files.

I've searched the Forum and other websites but cannot find anyone reporting or rectifying such a problem.

What am I doing wrong?

Kind regards

Mike
